forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfurls under a radiant sky, kissed by the warmth of the sun, all while the gentle breeze beckons those yearning for a brief escape. With temperatures hovering around a pleasant 67 degrees, the air is clear and invigorating, offering a striking contrast to the typical fog that often cloaks the city. Today, the landscape stands unveiled, showcasing a vivid panorama devoid of the usual marine layer. The golden spires of the Bay glisten invitingly in the sunlight.

As evening creeps in, a subtle shift awaits; the clouds will slip in, occasional aspersions of gray against the tranquil blue. The gentle west-southwest winds, currently cradling the air, will continue to whip ever-so-softly through the streets, bringing a hint of the chill that whispers of nightfall. It’s wise to don layers, perhaps a light sweater, to harmonize with the evening coolness that will settle around 56 degrees. 

This time of day promises the simple pleasures of a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to a quiet café where warm drinks can cradle your hands. For those who wish to savor the transition towards night, an excursion to view the artwork of the city under the softening light will surely enchant.
